name: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
quotes: Carol Burnett

name: There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
quotes: Alexander the Great

name: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
quotes: Michael Altshuler

name: Life has got all those twists and turns. You've got to hold on tight and off you go.
quotes: Nicole Kidman

name: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes: Walt Whitman

name: Be courageous. Challenge orthodoxy. Stand up for what you believe in. When you are in your rocking chair talking to your grandchildren many years from now, be sure you have a good story to tell.
quotes: Amal Clooney

name: You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
quotes: Oprah Winfrey

name: At the end of the day, whether or not those people are comfortable with how you're living your life doesn't matter. What matters is whether you're comfortable with it.
quotes: Dr. Phil

name: People tell you the world looks a certain way. Parents tell you how to think. Schools tell you how to think. TV. Religion. And then at a certain point, if you're lucky, you realize you can make up your own mind. Nobody sets the rules but you. You can design your own life.
quotes: Carrie Ann Moss

name: You don't always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go and see what happens.
quotes: Mandy Hale

name: You can be everything. You can be the infinite amount of things that people are.
quotes: Kesha

name: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
quotes: Ralph Waldo Emerson

name: I'm going to be gone one day, and I have to accept that tomorrow isn't promised. Am I OK with how I’m living today? It's the only thing I can help. If I didn't have another one, what have I done with all my todays? Am I doing a good job?
quotes: Hayley Williams

name: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
quotes: Robin Williams

name: Not having the best situation, but seeing the best in your situation is the key to happiness.
quotes: Marie Forleo

name: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes: Theodore Roosevelt

name: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.
quotes: Marlee Matlin

name: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes: Mahatma Gandhi

name: The greatest religion is to be true to your own nature. Have faith in yourselves.
quotes: Swami Vivekananda

name: Take risks in your life, If you win, you can lead! If you loose, you can guide!
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “Strength is life; weakness is death.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “Experience is the only teacher we have. we may talk and reason all our lives, but we shall not understand a word of truth.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “If you think yourselves strong, strong you will be.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “Take up one idea, make that one idea your life. Think of it, dream of it, Live on that idea let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “Stand up, be bold, and take the blame on your own shoulders. Do not go about throwing mud at other; for all the faults you suffer from, you are the sole and only cause.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “Meditation can turn fools in to sages but unfortunately fools never meditate.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “Learn everything that is good from others, but bring it in, and in your own way adsorb it; do not become others.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “In a conflict between the heart and the brain, follow your heart.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “That man has reached immortality who is disturbed by nothing material.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “You should work like a master and not as a slave; work incessantly, but do not do a slave’s work.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “Whatever you believe, that you will be, If you believe yourselves to be ages, ages you will be tomorrow. There is nothing to obstruct you.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “If i love myself despite my infinite faults, how can i hate anyone at the glimpse of a few faults”..!
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “You cannot believe in god until you believe in yourself.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: : “All power is within you. You can do anything and everything. Believe in that. Do not believe that you are weak; do not believe that you are half-crazy lunatics, as most of us do nowadays. Stand up and express the divinity within you.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “You are the creator of your own destiny.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “That which is selfish is immoral, and that which is unselfish is moral.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “Talk to yourself once in a day.. otherwise you may miss meeting an excellent person in this world.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “Throw away all weakness. tell your body that it is strong. Tell your mind that it is strong and have unbound faith and hope in yourself.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “All power is within you; you can do anything and everything.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “When you are doing any work.. do it as worship, as he highest worship, and devote your whole life to it for the time being.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: : “The mistake is that we want to tie the whole world down to our own plane of thought and to make out mind the measure of the whole universe.”
quotes: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”

name: “We are what our thought have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; They travel far.”
